emailTemplateUser:
We will confirm receiving your request by email, or by letter, in the next 5 working days.

Your request will then be checked to confirm that you have supplied all the information needed or to ask you to provide more details. 

What happens next

When we have all the necessary details, it takes up to 30 days to complete a request. Asking for an update during this time may mean it takes longer to get the information you want. 

Receiving personal information

Your personal information will be sent to the email or postal address you have provided.

Your request is protected by the Data Protection Act which means the information is confidential.
name: Request personal information
phaseText: This is a new service - your [feedback](https://eu.surveymonkey.com/r/G5SWVCT) will help us to improve it.
